subject: Package inquiry
description_text:
Hi I’m just wanting to know why my order has not arrived as on your website
it dates upto 15 days for delivery it has been 16 days already and I still
have not received the item. When I look at the tracking it says it’s still
in china.

Please update asap.

Kind regards,
Ethan Boehm - Director


*Web: *   adelaideconcretesolutions.com.au
<http://www.adelaideconcretesolutions.com.au/>
*Ph:  *     0411 554 249
*Office: *1/14 Bruce Ave
             Marleston SA 5033
